评论详情: Para el precio están muy bien y tallan super bien

These are probably much nicer with the gold or pink lenses. The frames are a bright (kind of cheap looking) rose gold color. Therefore, the blue lenses clash with the gold frames in a not good way. I bought these to use for a costume, and I don't even think they'll be good enough for that. But...the other color lenses may coordinate with the frames much better.
Good quality sunglasses. Cute and comfortable.

These are pretty sunglasses that have a real throwback feel. I'm finding lately I really like sunglasses that have lightly tinted lenses. I find they make bright sun tolerable and then I can wear them indoors when going in and out of shops or buildings with comfort. These sunglasses are charming and fun. They look like nice sunglasses because they are.
These are so cute and quality! Very stylish and dont fall off because they have the rubber nose pieces.
Glasses are beautiful. The fit was perfect. Lve the light pink lenses.
